tool.name: Amplicon Analysis Pipeline
tool.description: analyse 16S rRNA data from Illumina Miseq paired-end reads
tool.command:
## Create links to input FASTQs and Final_names.txt file #for $fq_pair in $fastq_pairs ln -s "${fq_pair.fastq_r1}" && ln -s "${fq_pair.fastq_r2}" && echo \$(basename ${fq_pair.fastq_r1})'\t'"${fq_pair.name}" >> Final_name.txt && echo \$(basename ${fq_pair.fastq_r2})'\t'"${fq_pair.name}" >> Final_name.txt && #end for
## Make links to Categories.txt and Metatable.txt ln -s "${categories_file_in}" Categories.txt ln -s "${metatable_file_in}" Metatable.txt
## Run the amplicon analysis pipeline script Amplicon_analysis_pipeline.sh -g "$forward_pcr_primer" -G "$reverse_pcr_primer" #if str( $trimming_threshold ) != "" -q $trimming_threshold #end if #if str( $minimum_overlap ) != "" -O $minimum_overlap #end if #if str( $minimum_length ) != "" -L $minimum_length #end if -P $pipeline $reference_database &&
## Collect outputs cp Final_name.txt "${final_name_file}" && cp Metatable_log/Metatable_corrected.txt "${metatable_corrected}" && cp ${pipeline.name}_OTU_tables/multiplexed_linearized_dereplicated_mc2_repset_nonchimeras_tax_OTU_table.biom "${tax_otu_table_biom_file}" && cp ${pipeline.name}_OTU_tables/otus.tre "${otus_tre_file}" && cp RESULTS/${pipeline.name}_${reference.name}/phylum_genus_dist/bar_charts.html "${phylum_genus_dist_barcharts_html}" && cp RESULTS/${pipeline.name}_${reference.name}/OTUs_count.txt "${otus_count_file}" && cp RESULTS/${pipeline.name}_${reference.name}/table_summary.txt "${table_summary_file}" && cp RESULTS/${pipeline.name}_${reference.name}/Heatmap/otu_table.html "${heatmap_otu_table_html}" && cp RESULTS/${pipeline.name}_${reference.name}/beta_div_even/weighted_2d_plot/weighted_unifrac_pc_2D_PCoA_plots.html "${beta_div_even_weighted_2d_plots}" && cp RESULTS/${pipeline.name}_${reference.name}/beta_div_even/unweighted_2d_plot/unweighted_unifrac_pc_2D_PCoA_plots.html "${beta_div_even_unweighted_2d_plots}"

param.name: forward_pcr_primer
param.label: Forward PCR primer sequence
param.help: Must not include barcode or adapter sequence (-g)

param.name: reverse_pcr_primer
param.label: Reverse PCR primer sequence
param.help: Must not include barcode or adapter sequence (-G)

param.name: trimming_threshold
param.label: Threshold quality below which read will be trimmed

param.name: minimum_overlap
param.label: Minimum overlap in bp between forward and reverse reads

param.name: minimum_length
param.label: Minimum length in bp to keep sequence after overlapping

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This pipeline has been designed for the analysis of 16S rRNA data from Illumina Miseq (Casava >= 1.8) paired-end reads.
.. class:: infomark
**Usage**
The pipeline isdivided in 3 steps:
* 1. Quality control with Cutadapt to check for and trim PCR primers, Sickle for quality trimming, SPADes for illumina Miseq error correction and Pandaseq to merge paired-end reads * 2.1 QIIME pipeline to remove singletons and chimeras and build otu table and phylogenetic tree * 2.2 UPARSE pipeline to remove singletons and chimeras and build otu table and phylogenetic tree * 2.3 Vsearch pipeline. A freely available programme almost identical to Uparse but not limited to 4GB RAM * 3. QIIME to perform beta and alpha diversity analysis
**Authors**
Pipeline author: Mauro Tutino
Galaxy tool: Peter Briggs
